author: dkulp
msg: When calling xpath.evaluate, the classloader MUST be the exact
classloader used to load the xpath expression.   Otherwise,
Don't hold onto the Factory as it can lock the classloader.  If this
causes a performance issue, we may need to relook at it.

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-3447] Don't get teh Bus unless really needed.

msg: remove obsolete targets, classname references from Ant build
